description:
Connor is a beefy straight guy with a little bend to his sexuality.
He's got great body hair, complete with a red carpet and a long (and wide!) runway.
Connor was very polite with "Yes Sir", and "No Sirs" officially making me feel either old, or in charge.
He seems like he might be down with doing more. He did mention he had his dick sucked by a dude for a few minutes, so I know he will be down for that, but the true test will be to see if will do some full on guy on guy fuckin!
I like this guy, I think he will be fun to mix in with the other dudes!
title: Connor - Solo
